rules.rationale: 'bgpdat' = blood glucose profile data. The DCCT trial's primary outcome was glycemic control, making this the central measurement table. Contains C-peptide, creatinine, glucose, and HbA1c from baseline, quarterly visits, and close-out. 888 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables that provide information about blood glucose profiles collected at baseline, quarterly visits, and close-out. Measurements include C-peptide, creatinine, glucose, and HbA1c.'

rules.rationale: 'ms' = manuscript. These tables were created for specific DCCT publications comparing standard vs experimental treatment outcomes. ms2=retinopathy, ms3=nephropathy, ms4=neuropathy, ms5=macrovascular, ms7=neuropsych, ms12=glycemic exposure. 112-713 vars each.
rules.description: e.g. 'The dataset represents variables used for a comparison of neuropsychological functions of DCCT volunteers who received standard diabetes treatment to those who received experimental diabetes treatment'

rules.rationale: Form 003 = annual history/physical. f0033 is the annual version, f003cmb2 is the combined version, f0034 is the close-out version. Covers diabetes management, adherence, complications, medications, general health. 343-497 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect annual information about e.g. diabetes management, adherence to treatment plan, diabetes-related complications, usage of medications, general health and well-being'

rules.rationale: Form 002 = eligibility physical exam and medical history. f002cmb4 contains detailed information from volunteers deemed eligible following the initial clinic visit. 389 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables that provide further information of volunteers deemed eligible following the initial clinic visit about their diabetes history and management'

rules.rationale: Form 001 = enrollment information collected at initial clinic visit.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variable information obtained at the initial clinic visit'

rules.rationale: 'hbam' = HbA1c measurements. HbA1c was the primary glycemic control indicator in DCCT. Collected at baseline, quarterly, and close-out. 236 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables describing HbA1c values, which were used as the main indicator of glycemic control; data were collected at baseline, quarterly, and close-out'

rules.rationale: 'diethist' = dietary history. Collected to assess whether dietary factors might confound treatment group comparisons. 156 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect information about volunteers' diets in order to determine if dietary factors might represent confounding effects'

rules.rationale: 'cbl' = core blood labs. Annual blood panels numbered cbl00 through cbl10 (11 collection timepoints). 67-69 vars each.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect annual information about blood laboratory results'

rules.rationale: EDIC follow-up core blood lab data, continuing the DCCT_cbl series. 88 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Laboratory data of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: Form 021 = fundus photography for retinopathy grading. f021cmb6 collects data at randomization and quarterly follow-up about diabetes management and retinal status. 373 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect information at randomization and at quarterly follow-up visits about diabetes management, adherence to treatment, and retinal health'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 030 = retinopathy assessment during the follow-up phase. f0302/f0303 correspond to different follow-up years. 143-144 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Retinopathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: Extended version of Form 021 — same retinopathy/fundus photography data with additional quarterly visit variables. 294 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect information at randomization and at quarterly follow-up visits about diabetes management and retinal health'

rules.rationale: Form 035 = SCL-90R (Symptom Checklist-90-Revised), a validated instrument for emotional status: anxiety, depression, fear, guilt, hostility, interpersonal sensitivity, etc. 145 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset represents variables of the SCL-90R questionnaire used for assessment of emotional status (presence/absence of anxiety, depression, fear, guilt, hostility)'

rules.rationale: Form 036 = quality of life assessment specific to diabetes. 94 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect information about quality of life'

rules.rationale: Form 128 = SF-36 (Short Form 36), a generic health-related quality of life survey. 76 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset represents variables of the SF-36 questionnaire'

rules.rationale: Form 122 = close-out psychological assessment administered at end of trial. 86 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset represents variables that assess (at close-out) psychological status'

rules.rationale: Form 024 = ECG testing data. 54 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset contains variables that represent ECG testing'

rules.rationale: Form 010 = CNS/renal function data. Despite 'CNS' mention in description, primary content is cognitive/motor function testing related to kidney disease assessment. 227 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect information about CNS functions, e.g. cognitive and motor functions, including memory, attention, arithmetic, verbal abilities'

rules.rationale: Form 106 = pregnancy and neuropathy assessment (combined form). Despite pregnancy mention in description, the table primarily tracks neuropathy outcomes during pregnancy. 148 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect information about pregnancies that occurred during DCCT, their outcome, and health of the mother'

rules.rationale: Form 114 = bone density measurements. 69 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables that were used to obtain bone density measurements'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 002 = medical history and physical exam during the follow-up phase. f0022/f0023/f0024 for different follow-up periods. 381-418 vars each.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Medical history and physical exam of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 004 = current medications. f0042/f0043/f0044 for different follow-up periods. 67-82 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Current medications of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 042 = glycemia/medication follow-up. Note: f0422/f0423 contain both glycemia AND medication data, but medications are the primary content. 113-115 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Glycemia of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 070 = health care delivery data. f0702-f0705 across follow-up periods. 223-237 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Health care delivery of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 060 = psychological observations during follow-up. f0602/f0612. 44-65 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Psychological observations of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 050 = neuropathy assessment during follow-up. f0502/f0503. 38-40 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Diabetic neuropathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC nephropathy follow-up dataset — renal function outcomes over 8 years. 53 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Diabetic nephropathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes at 8 year follow-up'

rules.rationale: EDIC neuropathy follow-up dataset — nerve function outcomes over 8 years. 52 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Diabetic neuropathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes at 8 year follow-up'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 090 = cardiovascular disease events. f0902/f0903/f0904 for different follow-up periods. 36-65 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Cardiovascular disease of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 091 = cerebrovascular disease events (stroke, TIA). f0913/f0914. 43-47 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Cerebrovascular disease of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 092 = peripheral vascular disease events. f0922/f0923. 48-67 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Peripheral vascular disease of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 093 = diabetic ketoacidosis (DKA) events. f0932/f0933/f0934. 25-30 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Diabetic ketoacidosis of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 094 = psychiatric disease events. f0942/f0943/f0944. 22-24 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Psychiatric disease of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 095 = major accident events. f0952/f0953/f0954. 28-41 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Major accident of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: EDIC Form 14xx = patient status and follow-up tracking. f1402/f1412/f1413/f1422/f1442/f1443/f1452. 10-38 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. Patient status of participants with Type 1 diabetes'

rules.rationale: Form 003 close-out version — comprehensive history collected at trial conclusion. 497 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used to collect information at close-out about diabetes management, adherence to treatment plan, diabetes-related complications'

rules.rationale: 'm9ex' = manuscript 9 adverse events. Subtypes: m9exall (all events), m9exevet (individual events), m9exdka (DKA), m9excaif (cardiac), m9exhpcs/hpra (hypoglycemia), m9exmorb (morbidity), m9exdeth (death). 9-135 vars each.
rules.description: 'The information published as Adverse Events and their Association with Treatment Regimens in the DCCT'

rules.rationale: Various DCCT clinical assessment forms: f005 (medications), f008 (eligibility), f028 (insulin therapy), f037 (family history), f045/f046 (cognitive), f047/f048/f049 (neurological), f056/f057 (voluntary withdrawal), f083 (retinal), f088 (nerve conduction), f097 (procedures), f108 (first-degree relatives).
rules.description: Various clinical assessment and eligibility forms, 14-86 vars each

rules.rationale: Form 013 = combined clinical data used alongside other instrument forms. 38 vars.
rules.description: 'The dataset represents variables used in combination with information from other forms'

rules.rationale: Administrative tables: baseline (selection of enrollment data, 80 vars), status (study status tracking, 62 vars), master (administrative variables, 8 vars), dtfamcls (family classification for diabetes type, 28 vars).
rules.description: e.g. 'The dataset represents a selection of DCCT-relevant data collected at baseline', 'This dataset contains administrative variables used for volunteer tracking'

rules.rationale: Form 027 = eye health status and functionality. Covers eye surgery, photocoagulation, intra-ocular pressure, eye medications. 137 vars.
rules.description: 'This dataset represents variables used to collect information about health status and functionality of eyes (presence/absence of eye surgery, photocoagulation, intra-ocular pressure, eye medications)'

rules.rationale: E-Selectin serum biomarker — an endothelial cell adhesion molecule, marker of vascular inflammation. 3 vars.
rules.description: 'EDIC. E-Selectin serum values of participants with Type 1 diabetes'
